module.name: Telemarketer Torture
module.description: An Endless IVR that you can send Telemarketers to and BlackList to Its Lenny.
module.changelog: *0.0.6* Add AGI Email Script *0.0.5* Add It's Lenny Blacklist Record Option *0.0.4* Add missing context.. woops no one caught that.... well someone just did hence this change... *0.0.3* Rework ext_goto to be future resistant and be more compliant with API, fix whitespace *0.0.2* Fix case for Pot party so it loops properly... *0.0.1* First Attempt at a module why not telemarketer torture...
